def max_hugs_for_vacation(n, x, d):
    AD = d + d - [0]
    S = [day * (day + 1) // 2 for day in d]
    S = S + S + [0]
    for i in range(1, 2 * n):
        AD[i] += AD[i - 1]
        S[i] += S[i - 1]
    ans = 0
    for r in range(n, 2 * n):
        ng = -1
        ok = r
        while abs(ok - ng) > 1:
            med = (ok + ng) // 2
            if AD[r] - AD[med] < x:
                ok = med
            else:
                ng = med
        l = ok
        res = S[r] - S[l - 1]
        dd = d[l % n] - (x - (AD[r] - AD[l]))
        res -= dd * (dd + 1) // 2
        ans = max(ans, res)
    return ans
